A new brand of cookies had come out and they were taking the world by storm. Amy had tried them for free at the store and she hadn't been able to put them down since then. There was something off about them and Rory was seeing habits in his wife that he had never seen before.

Amy was constantly snacking and because of that she had a little extra plush on her. To be fair it was maybe five pounds. But on a woman who was stick thin it made a difference. Her stomach, and face were a little softer but that was it, nothing to really worry about.

What was stopping Rory from being honest was that in a strange way it was his wildest fantasy coming true. Every since he was young Rory had day dreamed about woman getting fatter. In a way it was why he was attracted to Amy. She was a tall, skinny, red head beauty, the perfect woman, so the thought of her getting pudgy sent a shiver down his spine in excitement. 11111111.content:
Rory’s plan was simple, allow Amy to continue to eat and observe as she slowly but surely put on more and more weight. It had already been a week since Amy had asked about her weight and the issue had not come up again. What had come up was the issue of how quickly Amy was running out of her new favorite cookies. Rory found himself having to run to the market more and more as Amy’s appetite for the little cookies continued to grow.

That wasn’t the only thing that was growing. Amy was still putting on weight and with each day it was becoming more and more obvious. Rory quietly watched as Amy walked towards the kitchen, an already emptied box of cookies in her hand. By Rory’s count that was her third box today and it was barely even noon.

Amy was sporting her usual shirt and short skirt but there was certainly something a little different about her look today. The usual waif thin women now had an extra 15 pounds of weight on her frame. It was hard for Rory to tell how big Amy’s belly was as it was currently stuffed with cookies. The tiny pot belly stuck out straight in front of but was flanked on both sides but just the start of some love handles. Rory could tell that the button on the front of Amy’s skirt was seriously struggling now. As Amy walked her little belly jiggled and for just a second Rory could see a bit of her pale belly. Rory next noticed that Amy’s breasts had grown ever so slightly but not enough for Amy to really notice. Rory wished they would join in on the fun but for now he was playing the long game. Surveying down Rory found where the rest of the weight had landed. Amy’s booty had slowly swollen out some more. Nothing crazy but Amy certainly had a bit more butt then usual. It pulled the back of her skirt slightly tighter then usual. She walked past Rory and into the kitchen she looked down to her empty cookie box and Rory caught a glimpse at the start of a double chin.

Rory was on cloud nine. His plan was working, and Amy didn’t seem to be the wiser about any of it. He thought about how far he could take this, he daydreamed about the button popping off the front of her skirt and once again had to control himself. He heard a crash and a yelp from the kitchen and ran to see what had happened.

15112.content:
(Back there, i meant LIKE Something Borrowed with her being an alien surrogate, but this is for a dying race, not one that will kill her.)

It was a normal day in Torchwood, where Gwen Cooper was tracking an alien. She had gotten word that it was hiding in a house outside of downtown Cardiff. When she got to the house, she found an old, abandoned, two story house that must have been there since the fifties. She walked out her car, made sure her gun was ready in case anything went south, and went to the door. What surprised her was that the door open. She walked through the house, keeping her ear out for something weird. Up until she heard a loud wheezing coming from upstairs.

Cautiously, she crept up the stairs to the second floor. She walked up to the door where the wheezing was the loudest. With her gun in her hand, she kicked open the door. What was on the other side surprised her completely. Laying on the bed, under the blankets was a blue skinned woman with elf like ears, white hair, and a two inch long nose. The alien looked up when Gwen kicked down the door.

"Please..." said the alien weakly. "Don't... shoot..."

"Sorry," Gwen said as she put away her gun and walked over to the bed. "Are you all right?"

"I'm dying," the alien said.

"Don't worry," Gwen kneeled down so she was face to face with the alien. "My name is Gwen. I'm with Torchwood. We're a group of people who monitor alien activity on Earth. We can help you. What's your name?"

"I'm Reyax," the alien said. "If your curious of my species, I'm a Zerrinax. Unfortunately, I'm one of the last of my species. I can live up to three thousand years, but i caught an illness on this planet when i ate dairy."

"Are you allergic to it?" Gwen asked.

"Deathly allergic." Reyax answered. "It's killing me right now. I don't have a lot of time left."

"There must be something i can do." Gwen said.

Reyax considered this for a moment before she decided of something.

"There might be." Reyax. "I can't let my species die. Through mind waves, i can probably have you surrogate some more Zerrinax."

Gwen looked a little nervous when she said that.

"I don't know," Gwen said. "There's so much going on in my life. I don't think i can get pregnant right now. I mean are Zerrinax and Humans even compatible?"

"Actually, yes." Reyax said. "You wouldn't really be the first. Besides, it isn't really that different than human pregnancies."

"What differences are there?"

"Well, for one thing, the gestation period varies. The shortest on record is six months. But the longest is fourteen months. But the biggest difference is in the cravings and weight gain. You would be carrying up to three Zerrinax. You would get hungry easily and will want to eat more the next time you eat. You would gain a lot of weight. But every pound would come off when you gave birth. Another difference is the morning sickness. According to records, it only lasts the first trimester during a human pregnancy."

"How long does it last with you guys?" Gwen asked, unhappily. "Two trimesters? The whole pregnancy?"

"Three weeks." Reyax answered.

Gwen's eyes widened. "Really?"

"Really," Reyax answered. "So, do you want to do it?"

Gwen considered this for a moment. She did want to help Reyax, but she didn't know if she was telling the truth about everything.

"Give me a minute to call my boss." Gwen said. "Not trying to be rude, but we've faced loads of aliens that lied to our faces before. We don't really want that to happen again. You understand, of course?"

"Completely." Reyax said. "I get it. We're a peaceful species, so thousands of others have tried to wipe out our race. I get it. You want to make sure i'm not like them."

"Yes," Gwen said. "Thanks for understanding."

Gwen walked into the hallway to contact Jack. When she told him about everything Reyax told her, he understood it all.

"The Zerrinax are the second most peaceful species after the Zenitos. If she says she needs your help, then she's telling the truth. We have to help her."

"But why do i have to be the one who bees the surrogate?" Gwen asked him.

"Zerrinax only pass on children to people they trust completely. Only to people they trust with their lives. She trusts you. You have to be the one."

"Fine." Gwen said, depressed that he gave a good answer. "But i will only do it if you give me a paid vacation to a five star hotel when i'm nearing the end. You have to agree to pay for everything, no matter how expensive."

"Okay," Jack said, not fazed at all.

"But she tells me that i'll get really hungry, and eat even more with every meal."

"A friend of mine owes me two BILLION dollars. I doubt you"ll spend that much on food."

"Huh." Gwen said, actually happy. "This actually might not be so bad after all."

She hung up and went back in the room with Reyax.

"I've confirmed it with my boss: Your telling the truth... I'll do it."

"Excellent." Reyax said. "Thank you, Gwen. Thank you so much."

"So... how do we do this?"

"Come here."

Gwen walked over to Reyax and kneeled so she was face to face with her again. Reyax put both her hands on the sides of Gwen's head. Gwen could feel her teeth vibrating as their brain waves connected. When Reyax was done, Gwen passed out.
